---
title: "nf-postgwas - Post-GWAS Analysis Pipeline"
description: "nf-postgwas is a modular Nextflow pipeline to perform post-GWAS analyses, including variant annotation, loci compilation, LD annotation, fine-mapping, MAGMA gene analysis, PoPS prioritisation, colocalisation (GTEx/custom), enrichment, and druggability assessment."
---

This documentation site provides installation instructions, quickstart usage examples, per-subworkflow descriptions, and developer notes.
